Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character

Class DeckAssistants

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.DeckAssistants
public class DeckAssistants extends Object
Class to manage assistant distribution to players: each player has the same number of assistants, one for each type, so there are 4 groups of assistants, one for each player's deck.

    getSize()
    Returns the current size of the deck by counting the Assistant cards which have not been played yet.

    Returns the deck type (i.e. the magician displayed on the retro of the card).

    Plays the given assistant card, by removing it from the deck of the available cards.
